quoteText: YOU UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT KONGREGATE MAY CANCEL YOUR ACCOUNT AND DELETE ALL UGC ASSOCIATED WITH YOUR ACCOUNT AT ANY TIME, AND WITHOUT NOTICE, IF KONGREGATE DEEMS THAT YOU MATERIALLY BREACH THESE POSTING RULES, THIS AGREEMENT, APPLICABLE LAW, OR FOR ANY OTHER REASON. title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons
